resources.string: Camera will be muted across reboots.
Camera will not be muted across reboots.
Permissions error - unable to change camera mute settings.
In order for this app to work you must grant the write settings permission. Do you want to go to the settings page now?
Q: Why does my camera still make the shutter sound even when the switch is on?
Your phone\'s ringer is probably still on. Switch it to vibrate or mute.
Q: I updated my phone and camsung stopped working.
Samsung probably patched out the mechanism that camsung uses to mute the camera.
Q: Android warns me that this is an outdated app. What gives?

Android only allows you to write to the system settings table if your app targets SDK 22 or below. Unfortunately, a side effect of setting the app\'s SDK to 22 is that Android will warn the user that the app may be incompatible. This is by design, and you can ignore the warning.
Open the camera once the mute status is toggled
No camera app found. Unable to auto-launch camera.
